WEBHOOK.description: True/False if your server is web support required? the value is True else False

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

SHORT_API.description: Api Key Of shortner You Use.

SHORT_URL.description: Url of shortner site you use.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

MAX_RIST_BTNS.description: Maximum number of serch result buttons count ⚠️below 10 only

CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION.description: A custom file caption for your files. formatable with , file_name, file_caption, file_size, Read Readme.md for better understanding.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Updated Channel Username Without @ Not Chanel ID

IMDB.description: Imdb, the view of information when making True/False

PM_IMDB.description: pm Imdb, the view of information when making True/False

IMDB_TEMPLATE.value: 🏷 Title: {title} 🎭 Genres: {genres} 📆 Year: {year} 🌟 Rating: {rating} ☀️ Languages : {languages} 👨‍💼 Dɪʀᴇᴄᴛᴏʀ: {director} 👨🏻‍🦱 Pʀᴏᴅᴜᴄᴇʀ: {producer} 📑 wʀɪᴛᴇʀ: {writer} 📀 RunTime: {runtime} Minutes 📆 Release Info : {release_date} 🎛 Countries : {countries} 📓 Sᴛᴏʀy : {plot} 🍀Requested by🍀 : {message.from_user.mention}

IMDB_DELET_TIME.description: bot risult aouto delet time in second do to avoid group copyright issue. default is 300

SINGLE_BUTTON.description: choose b/w single or double buttons https://github.com/Aadhi000/Ajax/issues/22

START_MESSAGE.description: bot start message text [ {user} = bot startd user name {bot} = your bot name

FORCE_SUB_TEXT.description: custom force sub text (use ** = bold / use ``=  mono)

AUTH_GROUPS.description: Group Id. Only work a specific group/ your bot is public use? please just Skip this

WELCOM_TEXT.description: your group welcome text keyword({user} = joined use & {chat} = your chat name

PMFILTER.description: PM AutoFilter. set True to on / False to off

G_FILTER.description: GlobalFilter set True to on / False to off

BUTTON_LOCK.description: Button alert set True to on / False to off

RemoveBG_API.description: background remover website api key. get from https://www.remove.bg/b/background-removal-api

P_TTI_SHOW_OFF.description: Customize Result Buttons to Callback or Url by (True = url / False = callback)
